languages.text: "Значит, ты не усвоил{mf||а} практику в полной мере. Но это ничего. Когда Неумирающий протянет к тебе свою длань, предопределенное станет благом".
"You have not yet mastered this discipline. But do not fear. When the Undying One stretches out His hand to you, the inevitability of death will become a gift."
languages.original_text: "Значит, ты не усвоил{mf||а} практику в полной мере. Но это ничего. Когда Неумирающий протянет к тебе свою длань, предопределенное станет благом".

traits.locale_text: "Then you have not fully learned the discipline. Doesn't matter. When the Undying One reaches out His hand to you, the predetermined will become a boon."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then you have not fully learned the discipline. Doesn't matter. When the Undying One reaches out His hand to you, the predetermined will become a boon."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have not yet mastered this discipline. But do not fear. When the Undying One stretches out His hand to you, the inevitability of death will become a gift."

traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have not yet mastered this discipline. But do not fear. When the Undying One stretches out His hand to you, the inevitability of death will become a gift."

traits.locale_text: "You have not yet mastered this discipline. But do not fear. When the Undying One stretches out His hand to you, the inevitability of death will become a gift."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « Vous êtes encore loin de maîtriser cette discipline, mais n'ayez crainte. Lorsque l'Immortel vous tendra la main, l'inévitabilité de la mort deviendra un don. »
languages.original_text: "You have not yet mastered this discipline. But do not fear. When the Undying One stretches out His hand to you, the inevitability of death will become a gift."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes encore loin de maîtriser cette discipline, mais n'ayez crainte. Lorsque l'Immortel vous tendra la main, l'inévitabilité de la mort deviendra un don. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «Aún no ha dominado esta disciplina, pero no tema. Cuando el Inmortal extienda Su mano hacia usted, la inevitabilidad de la muerte será un don».
languages.original_text: "You have not yet mastered this discipline. But do not fear. When the Undying One stretches out His hand to you, the inevitability of death will become a gift."

traits.locale_text: «Aún no ha dominado esta disciplina, pero no tema. Cuando el Inmortal extienda Su mano hacia usted, la inevitabilidad de la muerte será un don».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “你还没能掌握祂的戒律，但不必害怕。当不死之神向你伸出手时，无可避免的死亡将会成为赐予你的礼物。”
languages.original_text: "You have not yet mastered this discipline. But do not fear. When the Undying One stretches out His hand to you, the inevitability of death will become a gift."

traits.locale_text: “你还没能掌握祂的戒律，但不必害怕。当不死之神向你伸出手时，无可避免的死亡将会成为赐予你的礼物。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたはまだこの訓練をマスターしていません。ですが、恐れることはないのです。不滅の神がその手を差し伸べるとき、死の必然は贈り物となります」
languages.original_text: "You have not yet mastered this discipline. But do not fear. When the Undying One stretches out His hand to you, the inevitability of death will become a gift."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたはまだこの訓練をマスターしていません。ですが、恐れることはないのです。不滅の神がその手を差し伸べるとき、死の必然は贈り物となります」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt diese Disziplin noch nicht gemeistert. Doch seid unbesorgt. Wenn der Todlose seine Hand nach Euch ausstreckt, wird die Unausweichlichkeit des Todes zu einem Geschenk werden."
languages.original_text: "You have not yet mastered this discipline. But do not fear. When the Undying One stretches out His hand to you, the inevitability of death will become a gift."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt diese Disziplin noch nicht gemeistert. Doch seid unbesorgt. Wenn der Todlose seine Hand nach Euch ausstreckt, wird die Unausweichlichkeit des Todes zu einem Geschenk werden."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Bu disiplinde henüz tam anlamıyla ustalaşamadın. Ama korkma. Ölmeyen, elini sana uzattığında ölümün kaçınılmazlığı bir armağan olacak."
languages.original_text: "You have not yet mastered this discipline. But do not fear. When the Undying One stretches out His hand to you, the inevitability of death will become a gift."
